sense.def:
A figure
je določena količina, izražena s številko, zlasti v statistiki.

A figure
je tudi katerikoli od desetih znakov od 0 do 9; z njimi ponazarjamo števila.

A figure
je oblika osebe, ki je ne vidimo jasno.

seg.quote: I could see a small female figure advancing towards us.

sense.def:
Človek, ki ga imenujemo
a particular type of figure
, je dobro znan in na neki način pomemben.

seg.quote: He was a key figure in the independence struggle.

sense.def:
Kadar je človek
a mother figure
ali
a hero figure
, ima lastnosti, značilne za matere ali junake.

One's figure
je oblika človekovega telesa.

A figure
je tudi risba ali diagram v knjigi.

seg.quote: The original design was modified (see Figure 4.)

sense.def:
To figure that something is the case
pomeni misliti ali uganiti, da je nekaj tako, kot je;

seg.quote: They figured it was better to stay where they were.

sense.def:
To figure in something
pomeni pojaviti se ali biti vsebovan v nečem, najsi bo človek ali stvar.

seg.quote: Loneliness figures quite a lot in his conversation.

sense.def:
Število, ki je
in double figures
, znaša med deset in devetindevetdeset. Število, ki je
in single figures
, znaša med nič in devet.

To put a figure on an amount
pomeni natančno povedati, kolikšno količino mislimo.

seg.quote: They said defence spending should be raised but put no figure on the increase they wanted.

sense.def:
To figure out something
pomeni najti rešitev ali razlog za nekaj, na primer za problem;

seg.quote: She had not yet figured out what she was going to do.
